outputs.output_descr: Capacity of the MoLHR will be enhanced to a)guide national employment and human resources development policies, plans and strategies through the strengthening of labour market analysis, and b) reduce unemployment, especially among youth and women through skills training & increased opportunities for self employment & small businesses

project_descr: Labour Market Analysis and Employment Generation especially amongst youth and women
